Check the Status of Your Order
Description: As a customer, I want the status of my order to be presented to me in the form of a simple report that is easily accessed on entrance to the shopping cart.  The report should include details regarding shipping information (tracking numbers and estimated arrival dates), the number of items I purchased (quantity and unit price), as well as the total amount spent.

Name: Cancel the Order
Description:
Investigate architecture approaches to order cancellation process.

Acceptance Criteria:
  • Order must not be shipped
  • credit card refunded
  • Fulfillment process reversed
  • restocking fee applied
  • undo 'cancel' functionality
Definition of Done:
  • 2 POC approaches
  • Timebox approach to 8 hours each spike
  • Estimate for each approach at task level
  • demo simple scenario

Name: Spike: Purchase Your Items
Description:
As a user I want to store things in my shopping cart and see them next time I am logged in, so I can save an order for payday.

Once a user enters an item into their shopping cart, persist that information in their profile so that it is available next time they login.

Acceptance Criteria:
  • User logged in adds to cart, these items stay associated with user until removed or purchased
  • User logs in with items in shopping cart and items before login are added to 'stored' cart
  • When user logins in after 7 days of inactivity they are prompted/notified about the items in their 'stored' cart
Definition of Done:
  • Code Checked In
  • Unit Tested
  • Accept Test Passed
  • No Defects
  • Accept Tests added to automated framework
  • Online help docs updated

Name: Recent Purchases View
Description:
As a user I should be allowed to select overnight shipping for their order so I can pay to get my stuff as fast as possible.

Acceptance Criteria:
  • User is defaulted to standard First Class USPS shipping
  • User can change shipping options to Overnight (FEDEX)
  • User see's estimated arrival date of order when changing options
  • User sees a the calculated cost of Overnighting before moving to the payment screens
Definition of Done:
  • Code Checked In
  • Unit Tested
  • Accept Test Passed
  • No Defects
  • Accept Tests added to automated framework
  • Online help docs updated

Name: Shop for Items
Description: A customer should be able to browse the list of all available products to find the items they wish to purchase. The system should provide suggestions to the customer based on previous purchases and items currently in his/her shopping cart.

Name: Purchase Your Items
Description:
As a customer, I want to be able to purchase items online and to be prompted to enter payment information as well as their preferred shipping method and destination, so that I can pay and have my stuff shipped to me.  

Acceptance Criteria:
  • User logged in adds to cart, these items stay associated with user until removed or purchased
  • User logs in with items in shopping cart and items selected before login are added to 'stored' cart
  • When user logins in after 7 days of inactivity they are prompted/notified about the items in their 'stored' cart

Definition of Done:

  • Code Checked In
  • Unit Tested
  • Accept Test Passed
  • No Defects
  • Accept Tests added to automated framework
  • Online help docs updated

Name: Validate Customer Contact/Shipping info
Description:
As a customer, I want my email and shipping addresses validated to make me known to the system, and to add another layer of protection against fraud.

Acceptance Criteria:
  • Email address validated
    • validate format
    • email them a message then have them confirm by clicking a link
  • Check Shipping
    • Address must exist validate against USPS DFS2 Validation DB
  • Perform Validation upon creation/change of info and each order placed
Definition of Done:
  • Code Checked In
  • Unit Tested
  • Accept Test Passed
  • No Defects
  • Accept Tests added to automated framework
  • Oneline help docs updated
